title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 October 2015 - XWiki
content: has joined #xwiki 00:03  Hey everyone! I'm having an issue with xwiki 7.2 when rendering the document tree macro 00:16  seems everyone is away. Anyway, you may find this later. The issue seems to be that the macro is not generating the appropriate HTML. 00:17  the {{documentTree/}} is replaced with (% class='xtree ' ... %) 00:18  all needed JS and CSS files are being pulled 00:18  but since the JS is looking for it just never renders 00:18  has joined #xwiki 00:18  if I manually add an HTML snippet through {{html}} tree {{/html}} 00:18  it does render properly however 00:19  but only this new anchor I manually add, the utput of the macro remains as "(% class='xtree ' ..." 00:23  has quit 00:49  has quit 01:19  has joined #xwiki 01:24  has quit 01:40  has joined #xwiki 01:40  hello! 01:41  I've installed xwiki but can't figure out how to reset the superadmin password. in fact, I was never prompted for a user or password at all during setup 01:55  oh those things computers do... 01:55  just restarted tomcat a second time and now it works, oh wel :0 02:00  now howdo I install the installer manager? o.O 02:00  has quit 02:17  has quit 02:20  has joined #xwiki 02:24  has quit 02:30  has joined #xwiki 03:20  has joined #xwiki 03:25  has quit 04:21  has joined #xwiki 04:26  has quit 04:54  has joined #xwiki 04:55  has quit 05:13  has quit 05:22  has joined #xwiki 05:26  has quit 06:03  has quit 06:05  has joined #xwiki 06:23  has joined #xwiki 06:28  has quit 07:23  has joined #xwiki 07:23  has joined #xwiki 07:24  has joined #xwiki 07:28  has quit 07:34  has quit 07:49  has joined #xwiki 07:52  has joined #xwiki 07:54  sdumitriu: good morning 07:56  sdumitriu: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12331# caused some build issues, see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/ for example. thanks! 08:03  has quit 08:04  has quit 08:05  has joined #xwiki 08:17  has quit 08:20  has joined #xwiki 08:20  has joined #xwiki 08:21  has quit 08:22  has quit 08:25  has joined #xwiki 08:27  has joined #xwiki 08:36  good morning 08:36  I broke a lot of tests yesterday with my vm changes (it caused some failure in the get action that I'm investigating) 08:49  hopefully should be good now 09:06  has joined #xwiki 09:42  has joined #xwiki 09:47  has quit 09:52  has joined #xwiki 09:52  has quit 10:06  has joined #xwiki 10:07  has joined #xwiki 10:14  has quit 10:18  has joined #xwiki 10:43  has joined #xwiki 10:48  has quit 11:44  has joined #xwiki 11:48  has quit 12:13  has joined #xwiki 12:14  has joined #xwiki 12:19  has quit 12:25  has joined #xwiki 12:39  has joined #xwiki 13:16  has quit 13:17  has joined #xwiki 13:23  has joined #xwiki 13:39  has quit 13:57  has quit 13:59  vmassol: Any suggestions for a proper fix? 14:00  It's wrong to expect 200 for an actual exception, but the test framework treats 500 as an error 14:02  sdumitriu: I haven't analysed the code nor the test sdumitriu so I don't know at this stage but if you're sure f yourself then you also need to update the test fwk I guess 14:10  has quit 14:13  has joined #xwiki 14:15  has quit 14:17  has joined #xwiki 14:22  vmassol: OK, fixing 14:41  has joined #xwiki 14:59  has quit 14:59  has joined #xwiki 15:02  has joined #xwiki 15:16  has quit 15:20  has quit 15:22  has joined #xwiki 15:33  has joined #xwiki 15:43  hey good news, we now have a rating of A for the sqale rating on http://sonar.xwiki.org/ 15:43  I guess they tweaked their rating ;) 15:43  nice debt of 1159 days on platform... 15:45  9 mn 17s (http://sonar.xwiki.org/drilldown/measures/1963?metric=test\_execution\_time) for our 3206 unit tests 15:46  wow AnnotationXHTMLRendererTest is pretty long to execute: 40s! 16:03  vmassol: escape tests fixed http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/ 16:04  cool thanks 16:28  has quit 16:39  has joined #xwiki 16:40  has quit 17:06  has joined #xwiki 17:26  has quit 17:39  has joined #xwiki 18:00  has quit 18:01  has quit 18:09  has quit 18:46  has joined #xwiki 18:55  has joined #xwiki 18:56  has joined #xwiki 19:07  has quit 19:22  has quit 19:22  has quit 19:23  has quit 19:24  has quit 19:26  has joined #xwiki 19:45  has quit 19:45  has joined #xwiki 19:49  has quit 19:53  has joined #xwiki 19:56  has joined #xwiki 19:57  has quit 20:08  has quit 20:13  has quit 20:13  has quit 20:14  has quit 20:16  has joined #xwiki 20:34  has quit 20:45  has joined #xwiki 21:19  has quit 21:28  has quit 21:30  has joined #xwiki 22:06  has joined #xwiki 22:33  has quit 23:36  has quit
